akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of the Healthy Youth and Schools Commission.

akn:content.akn:p: There is established the Healthy Youth and Schools Commission with the purpose of advising the Mayor and the Council on health, wellness, and nutritional issues concerning youth and schools in the District, including:
Specific functions of the Commission shall include the following:

On or before November 30 of each year, the Commission shall submit to the Mayor and the Council a comprehensive report on the health, wellness, and nutrition of youth and schools in the District. The report shall:
